sentences.en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
sentences.cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

sentences.en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentences.cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
sentences.cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

sentences.en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
sentences.cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

sentences.en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentences.cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentences.en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentences.cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

sentences.en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: It's an uphill battle but I think we're going to win.
sentences.cn: 虽然这是一场艰苦的斗争，但我相信我们会取得胜利。

sentences.en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentences.cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentences.en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentences.cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentences.en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

trans.tran_cn: 一（在元音字母前代替不定代词a），一任一某一，一个
trans.tran_en: used when the following word begins with a vowel sound

trans.tran_cn: 一（个）〔用于以元音开头的单词前〕
trans.tran_en: used when the following word begins with a vowel sound
